_header: In every place ye may well see
Subjects: women, praise of; carols, of women; satire
_description: The excellence (or not!) of women — ten quatrains (aaaa) with burden: ‘Of all creatures women be best / Cuius contrarium verum est’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
In euery place ye may well seþat women be trew as tyrtyll on
                    tre…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Or with fynekerchefs to go displaidye wold saie þei be
                    provd it is evil said

OxfBal354.First Lines:
In euery place ye may well seeThat women be trewe as tirtyll on
                    tree…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Ye wold say they be prowde it is yll saidCuius contrarium
                        verum est
